title: Introduction to medicode
text: medicode utility tool contains metadata medical classification clinical coding. motivation two-fold: Standardization: Norway, systems (hospital electronic health record systems) Norwegian coding abbreviations, can inconvenient read human researchers, standardize reports. Reference: medicode provides consistent way extract corresponding code range, list causes death.

what: List of code for Cause of death
title: Introduction to medicode
code: code_death <- medicode::cause_of_death head(code_death) #>    code                          description_en #> 1:    0                All deaths from diseases #> 2:    1       Infectious and parasitic diseases #> 3:  1.1                            Tuberculosis #> 4:  1.2                        AIDS HIV disease #> 5:  1.3                         Viral hepatitis #> 6:  1.4 Other infectious and parasitic diseases #>                                 description_no #> 1:                  Alle dødsfall av sykdommer #> 2: Infeksiøse, inkludert parasittære sykdommer #> 3:                                 Tuberkulose #> 4:                       AIDS og HIV-infeksjon #> 5:     Akutt hepatitt og kronisk virushepatitt #> 6:   Andre infeksiøse og parasittære sykdommer #>                                         code_icd10 #> 1:                                         A00-R99 #> 2:                                         A00-B99 #> 3:                                    A15-A19, B90 #> 4:                                         B20-B24 #> 5:                                  B15-B19, B94.2 #> 6: A00-A09, A20-B09, B25-B89, B91-B94.1, B94.8-B99

title: Introduction to medicode
code: head(medicode::icd10_en) #>     Code                                     description_en #> 1:  A000 Cholera due to Vibrio cholerae 01, biovar cholerae #> 2:  A001    Cholera due to Vibrio cholerae 01, biovar eltor #> 3:  A009                               Cholera, unspecified #> 4: A0100                         Typhoid fever, unspecified #> 5: A0101                                 Typhoid meningitis #> 6: A0102               Typhoid fever with heart involvement head(medicode::icd10_no) #>    Code                                         description_no #> 1: A000 Kolera som skyldes Vibrio cholerae 01, biovar cholerae #> 2: A001    Kolera som skyldes Vibrio cholerae 01, biovar eltor #> 3: A009                                    Uspesifisert kolera #> 4: A010                                            Tyfoidfeber #> 5: A011                                      Paratyfoidfeber A #> 6: A012                                      Paratyfoidfeber B

title: Authors and Citation

title: Medical Classification and Clincial Coding
text: project provide metadata tools medical classification clinical coding. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Medical_classification far following code lists included: ICD-10 (English, Norwegian) European Shortlist Cause Death (English, Norwegian)

title: Medical Classification and Clincial Coding
